name: Paris, France
notes: Most mid-range hotels can provide travel cots on requestâ€”email ahead.
Metro stations vary for stroller access; buses are often easier.
Parks like Jardin du Luxembourg have great playgrounds.

name: Tokyo, Japan
notes: Convenience stores stock baby supplies; large drugstores everywhere.
Most stations have elevators; look for 'barrier-free' signs.
Noise insulation is good; ask for higher floors for naps.
